meanings.sent1: Wearing those sunglasses makes you look really kewl.
meanings.sent2: The new sneakers are so kewl; everyone wants a pair.
meanings.sent3: I feel kewl like a movie star in this outfit.
meanings.sent4: Her style is always kewl, like a breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent5: The kewl jacket stood out in the crowd.

meanings.definition: (adverb) In a cool or stylish manner.
meanings.sent1: She danced kewl at the party last night.
meanings.sent2: He plays the guitar kewl, like a rockstar.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked kewl across the room, like it owned the place.
meanings.sent4: The car sped down the street kewl, as if it had wings.
meanings.sent5: The singer sang kewl, captivating the audience.

meanings.definition: (interjection) Used to express approval or agreement.
meanings.sent1: Kewl! Let's go to the park.
meanings.sent2: I got tickets to the concert. - Kewl!
meanings.sent3: Kewl, I didn't know you could do that trick.
meanings.sent4: Kewl as a cucumber, he aced the test.
meanings.sent5: Kewl beans, we finished the project on time.
